title: Raceday Countdown Causes 500 Error for New Users (Fixed: Aug 11, 2025) - v2.0.3
resolution: The backend route for the Raceday Countdown was catching an error but incorrectly returning a 500 status code. The logic has been updated to gracefully handle the error and return a successful 200 OK response with `event: null`, which the frontend can handle without crashing.

title: Application Errors on Feature Page Load (Fixed: Aug 11, 2025) - v2.0.1
resolution: The application was trying to load data for the Race Schedule page even when it wasn't visible, causing a crash. The logic was refactored to a 'lazy loading' approach, where data is only fetched when the corresponding view is activated. This resolves the errors and improves performance.
